title: Sex Pistols Guitarist Steve Jones: No One Gave A Fuck About Scott Weiland The Day Before He Died [News]
text:
Posted 5 hours ago 8 
In his new book "Lonely Boy," Sex Pistols guitarist Steve Jones touched on late Stone Temple Pilots frontman Scott Weiland, saying how no one cared for him shortly before his death in December 2015. 
Steve noted (via Alternative Nation ): "I went to a few 12-step meetings where [Scott Weiland] was there. But I could tell from the start just by sensing his vibe that he simply didnâ€™t get it and never would. 
"The day before his death, no one gave a fuck about him, and just wrote him off. The next day, all the radio stations were milking him for all he was worth."
